Date: Fri, 16 Mar 2001 07:27:09 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Autobots nest
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Motormaster heads towards the signal in Turkey. As he aproaches he can see
the smokey ruins of what was either a battle, or a crashed ship. He lands,
dust and ash spewing around his feet from the impact. He walks forward and
inspects the wreckage. It was a ship no doubt, and it had been totally
ripped open from explosions and grinding against the earth as it came to a
stop. He peels away a strip of metal, it looked a lot like an Autobot
shuttle, he thought to himself, hoping it wasnt the case. But as he opened
the flap of metal he was holding, it revealed the red symbol of his hated
enemies. His face changed from a grimace, to a snarl, as he clenched his
fingers into the metal sheet with the Autobot symbol on it, and then pulled
his arms apart, tearing the metal in fury. He moved int the shuttle for a
closer inspection.
